name: Zeri Plant
description:
Zeri Plant is a farming simulation game on development  where you can play as Pandi, a traveling animal who, together with his companions, arrived on a planet called Zeri and found different species living in harmony and sharing the same vital energy.

Pandi and the travelers decided to help plants and other species to collect and manage the energy of the magic tree.

Plant the seeds, take care of the plants by giving them water, ward off pests that will arrive at night, keep the soil with nutrients, unlock more plants and harvest the fruits to fill the energy of the tree.

Features:

  • This is a permaculture simulator in which you get to seed, grow and harvest your plants.
  • Plants need wather and good soil to produce more energy.
  • Unlock items and decorate your room with each level.
  • Talk to the different characters of the village.
  • Use the crystals from the magic tree to buy items on the market.
  • Beware of bugs at night.
  • Explore the village.
